unidade: Faculdade de Medicina Veterinária e Zootecnia
objetivos:
- To encourage discussions on topics related to Global Health and highlight the importance of the role of veterinarians in this context.
- To encourage students to participate in exchange programs and expand the possibilities for international partnerships.
- To identify financing mechanisms and promote meetings to improve exchanges
programa_resumido:
The elective course of International Veterinary Medicine (1 credit), proposed in the 2018 FMVZ Academic Project, aims to foster discussion on topics related to Global Health, where the participation of veterinarians is essential, in addition to encouraging our students to participate in exchange programs.
It also aims to expand the list of institutions abroad that can receive our students, and identify mechanisms for financing these programs.
The course aims to promote meetings between exchange students and those aspiring to the exchange program, aiming to improve it.

turmas.observacoes: Oferecida integralmente na língua inglesa conforme previsto na Resolução CoG - 7.071, de 26/06/2015
